definitions.definition: A member of the Hindu priestly caste , one of the four varnas or social groups based on occupation in ancient Hindu society.
One who has realized or attempts to realize Brahman , i.e. God or supreme knowledge .
A scholar , teacher , priest , intellectual , researcher , scientist , knowledge- seeker , or knowledge worker .
A member of a social and cultural elite , especially in the New England region of the USA.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly US , especially New England , capitalized

definitions.definition: A learned person of refined taste and mild manners .

main_definition: A member of the Hindu priestly caste , one of the four varnas or social groups based on occupation in ancient Hindu society.
secondary_definitions: One who has realized or attempts to realize Brahman , i.e. God or supreme knowledge .
A scholar , teacher , priest , intellectual , researcher , scientist , knowledge- seeker , or knowledge worker .
( chiefly US , especially New England , capitalized ) A member of a social and cultural elite , especially in the New England region of the USA.
A learned person of refined taste and mild manners .
